name: Defend The Planet (itch)
description:
Hello everyone,

I'm Ayushman,

This is the very first game I made on my comeback. I made my first game when I was 14 years old. Then I made some games at that time. And after that when I turned 15 I deleted all those awful flash games. But then in 2017 I found my passion back on game development and at that point using gamemaker studio 1.4 I made this game, Defend The Planet. This game is made by following a bunch of tutorials.

It might seem like another asteroid clone, but this is much more to me...

Everything is this game is made by me, (Including Sound and Art)

I want to thank those youtubers without whom this game was impossible to be made... Their tutorials helped me a lot.
